text: Kelly McGillis (born July 9, 1957) is an American actress. She was born in Newport Beach, California. She starred in Witness, Top Gun and The Accused. McGillis is openly lesbian.Kelly McGillis joins lesbian partner in civil union == References == == Other websites == * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Newport Beach, California Category:Actors from Orange County, California Category:LGBT people from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT actors
title: Kelly McGillis
